channel.title: Error: player is already online. Please help me =\
channel.description:
[code][client-1-vorarg]: Auto saved game. [client-1-vorarg]: Auto saving moreinfo file... [client-1-vorarg]: Successfuly auto saved moreinfo file. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000000 at stream.writeByte(stream.java:187) at client.addItem(client.java:13423) at client.fromBank(client.java:12345) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21305) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16711) at client.process(client.java:16682) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47) Vorargscape Server [fatal] - exception Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000001 at stream.createFrameVarSizeWord(stream.java:168) at client.sendFrame126(client.java:8035) at client.writePlayers(client.java:13) at client.process(client.java:15836) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1337 Client type: low memory version UserId: 18370464 vorarg is signing onto server. [client-7-vorarg]: vorarg is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from cpc1-bagu3-0-0-cust678.bagu.cable.ntl.com:1252 Client type: low memory version UserId: 46346171 Gohan is signing onto server. [client-8-Gohan]: Gohan is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from 5.163.240.12:2427 Client type: low memory version UserId: 4298839 p00nage is signing onto server. [client-9-p00nage]: p00nage is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from 5.158.77.54:1874 ClientHandler: Accepted from cpc1-bagu3-0-0-cust678.bagu.cable.ntl.com:1254 Client type: low memory version UserId: 35764869 pwned is signing onto server. [client-10-pwned]: pwned is already online. Client type: low memory version UserId: 46346171[/code]
I get this error like randomly, it pisses me off is there anyway I can fix it?

item.title: Error: player is already online. Please help me =\
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

search for

ublic void loggedinpm()

delete this

public void loggedinpm(){
                                pmstatus(2);
		                for(int i1 = 0; i1 < handler.maxPlayers; i1++)
			        if(!(handler.players[i1] == null) && handler.players[i1].isActive)
				handler.players[i1].pmupdate(playerId, 1);
                                //loadpm(1327848063, 987);
		                boolean pmloaded = false;
for(int i = 0; i < friends.length; i++) {
			if(friends[i] != 0) {
				for(int i2 = 1; i2 < handler.maxPlayers; i2++) {
					if (handler.players[i2] != null && handler.players[i2].isActive && misc.playerNameToInt64(handler.players[i2].playerName) == friends[i]) {
						if (playerRights >= 2 || handler.players[i2].Privatechat == 0 || (handler.players[i2].Privatechat == 1 && handler.players[i2].isinpm(misc.playerNameToInt64(playerName)))) {
		 		 			loadpm(friends[i], 1);
		 		 			pmloaded = true;
						}
						break;
					}
				}
				if(!pmloaded) 	loadpm(friends[i], 0);
				pmloaded = false;
			}
for(int i1 = 1; i1 < handler.maxPlayers; i1++) {
    			if(handler.players[i1] != null && handler.players[i1].isActive == true) {
				handler.players[i1].pmupdate(playerId, 1);
			}
		}
		}
 }

i.e. delete the void

look for

case 188:

delete the case

look for

case 133:

delete the case

yw

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

2 problems

  1. friends\ignore list
    escpecially ignore list, dont allow any users to have anyone on either of these lists
  2. massers

to fix it if it does happen, x out runserver and open a new one

item.title: Error: player is already online. Please help me =\
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

GoldenShard:

To solve this, you either reload the server (restart it) or you log off and then log back on your computer name.

It gets annoying when I have to restart it every 5 minutes.
But my computer really doesnt lag much.

Read full topic
